          <title>
            <string language="en">The hydrogen scare and the Hindenburg disaster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Wasserstoffschrecken und der Hindenburg 
Unfall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'alarme d'hydrogène et le désastre de 
Hindenburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O scare do hidrogênio e o disastre de Hindenburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spavento dell'idrogeno ed il disastro di 
Hindenburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο τρόμος υδρογόνου και η καταστροφή Hindenburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El susto del hidrógeno y el desastre de 
Hindenburg</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the airship Hindenburg, which caught fire and rapidly burned.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Luftschiff Hindenburg, 
das Feuer abfing und schnell brannte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le dirigeable 
Hindenburg, qui a attrapé le feu et a rapidement brûlé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o dirigível Hindenburg, 
que travou o fogo e se queimou ràpidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il dirigibile 
Hindenburg, che ha interferito il fuoco e velocemente si è bruciato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το αεροσκάφος 
Hindenburg, το οποίο επίασε την πυρκαγιά και που έκαψε 
γρήγορα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el dirigible 
Hindenburg, que cogió el fuego y se quemó rápidamente.</string>
          </description>
